game.name: Dimensional Gates
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, Steam 도전 과제, 컨트롤러 완벽 지원, 카메라 움직임 조정, 색상 대체, 음량 개별 조정, 난이도 조정, 키보드 전용 옵션, 퀵타임 이벤트 없이 플레이 가능, 스테레오 사운드, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Truly ambitious Indie RPG with innovative modern concepts and original storylines. Normal mode has random encounters and boss fights. Story mode has no random encounters and boss fights play themself out. Can you stop the Shetman from destroying the strings and the very fabric of our Universe?
game.shortDescriptionEn: Truly ambitious Indie RPG with innovative modern concepts and original storylines. Normal mode has random encounters and boss fights. Story mode has no random encounters and boss fights play themself out. Can you stop the Shetman from destroying the strings and the very fabric of our Universe?
game.publishers: Not Allowed to Die Gaming Studios
